sys_update_version.name: sp_rel_widget_clone_5267f2ed2fd71510bdcc5fd92799b6bc
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="Copy of Community - Notifications">da67f2ed2fd71510bdcc5fd92799b6b8</child><cloned>2022-11-21 10:30:31</cloned><last_validated>2022-11-21 10:30:31</last_validated><parent display_value="Community - Notifications">b8d131f2675132007bf09a6617415a3a</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category/><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope) {
	/* widget controller */
	var c = this;
	var i = 0;
	var notificationMsg = [];
	notificationMsg = [{message: c.data.hasInfoNotificationParam,type: c.data.InfoNotificationType},
			 {message: c.data.hasErrorNotificationParam,type: c.data.ErrorNotificationType}];
	
	while(i<notificationMsg.length){
		if(notificationMsg[i].message){
			$scope.$emit('$$uiNotification', [notificationMsg[i]]);
		}
		i++;
	}
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id/><internal>false</internal><link/><name>Community - Notifications</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles>snc_external,snc_internal</roles><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	/* populate the 'data' object */
	/* e.g., data.table = $sp.getValue('table'); */

	var ErrorNotificationParam = gs.getSession().getClientData('cm.content.delete.notify');
	data.hasErrorNotificationParam = ErrorNotificationParam ? ErrorNotificationParam: false;
	var InfoNotificationParam = gs.getSession().getClientData('cm.content.post.notify');
	data.hasInfoNotificationParam = InfoNotificationParam ? InfoNotificationParam: false;
	
	if(data.hasErrorNotificationParam){
		gs.getSession().putClientData('cm.content.delete.notify',null);
		data.ErrorNotificationType = "error";
	}
	if(data.hasInfoNotificationParam){
		gs.getSession().putClientData('cm.content.post.notify',null);
		data.InfoNotificationType = "info";
	}
})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-08 06:44:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>b8d131f2675132007bf09a6617415a3a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Community - Notifications</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Communities" source="sn_communities">10809a9edb866200b1f6f78eaf961904</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Communities">10809a9edb866200b1f6f78eaf961904</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_b8d131f2675132007bf09a6617415a3a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-14 04:56:05</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div><!-- your widget template --></div>]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-21 10:30:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>5267f2ed2fd71510bdcc5fd92799b6bc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>da67f2ed2fd71510bdcc5fd92799b6b8</sys_name><sys_package display_value="octoMobile" source="x_938832_octomobil">0fa9e0a32fc75110bdcc5fd92799b649</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="octoMobile">0fa9e0a32fc75110bdcc5fd92799b649</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_5267f2ed2fd71510bdcc5fd92799b6bc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-21 10:30:31</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>
